title: Consciousness, God, Religious Experience & Distributed Cognition w/ Paul Antleitner
description:
This is my second discussion into dialogos with Paul Antleitner and we explore in an emergent manner the connections between consciousness, the sacred, and distributed cognition. 

0:00 Intro
0:30 What are Psycho-Technologies?
9:53 Are We Already Transhumanists?
15:35 Does Culture Program Consciousness? Can We Program Culture?
20:34 Distributed Cognition & Culture
27:19 DO NASA Scientists Have Religious Experience with Mars Rover "Spirit"?
32:32 Can Naturalism Explain Consciousness? Why Does Vervaeke Dialogue with Religious Thinkers?
39:27 Is There Anything Beyond Material Universe?
44:16 David Bentley Hart & Consciousness. Is there an ULTIMATE Consciousness?
54:19 Can Non-Reductive Physicalists and Theists Share a Common Pursuit?
58:28 Christ Revealing Himself in Platonic/Neoplatonic Thought?
1:01:59 Religious Experience & "Higher" Levels of Consciousness? Union with the One?
1:10:44 Is All Spiritual/Religious Experience Good? Is there "Demonic" Deception? Jordan Peterson
1:18:59 Can Science Tell Us What Is Good or Does that Value Judgement Require a Christ?
1:24:52 Can We Keep "Leveling Up" Beyond Cultural Programming towards Ultimate Reality?
1:28:11 Vervaeke's "The Sacred". Is the Logos Necessary to Access Truth, Goodness, & Beauty?
1:34:39 If Jesus Isn't Lord, Then Isn't Something Else? What's Your North Star?
1:41:06 Why We Need Dialogue With Others That We Disagree With


Paul's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2yCyOMUeem-cYwliC-tLJg

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis. You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
